full_summary:
================================
**Title:** MV Confederation Sewage Treatment System Replacement

**Reference Number:** WS4424190762-Doc4430191547

**Amendment Number:** 3

**Publication Date:** February 5, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** March 5, 2024, at 2:00 pm (EST)

**Procurement Information:**

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **UNSPSC:** 47101524 - Sludge or Sewage Composting Equipment

**Project Overview:**

Transport Canada requires a new sewage treatment plant to replace the existing system on MV Confederation. The new system must conform to all regulatory requirements outlined in the Statement of Requirements.

**Key Requirements:**

*   Compliance with regulatory requirements
*   Replacement of the existing sewage treatment system
*   Conformity to all requirements outlined in the Statement of Requirements

** Tendering Process:**

The tendering process is open, and bids will be accepted until the closing date above. The selection criteria will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Contact Information:**

*   **Contact Name:** Christopher Young (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email:** christopher.young@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
